mapper.select: SELECT comments.id, comments.user_id, comments.article_id, comments.body, comments.created_at, users.id AS comment_user_id, users.avatar, users.name FROM comments JOIN users ON comments.user_id = users.id WHERE comments.article_id = #{articleId} ORDER BY comments.created_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (user_id, article_id, body, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{articleId}, #{body}, NOW())
